title: Can I apply now for the NDA 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: NDA 2 application 2020 has been delayed by the Union Public Service Commission (UPSC). The application form will now be released on June 16. Earlier, NDA 2 application form was scheduled to be released on June 10. The application is Rs 100, however, SC/ST candidates/Sons of JCOs/NCOs/ORs are exempted from paying the fees. Post completion of the application process, UPSC releases the list of candidates whose application form is rejected due to the non-payment of the exam fee. The examination authority also provides an opportunity to candidates to withdraw NDA application form if they are not interested to appear in the exam after applying for the exam.
